dcterms:description: A rigorously curated collection of over 86,815 real charts sourced from the Open Access (OA) section of PubMed Central (PMC), comprising both multi-panel and single-panel charts, with a focus on single-panel charts for downstream tasks.
dcterms:title: Chart-Infographics Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Siegel
Z. Horvitz

S. Divvala
A. Farhadi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing charts extracted from Arχiv publications, used to enhance training data for chart data extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: Charts from Arχiv publications

dcterms:creator: K. Davila
C. Tensmeyer
S. Shekhar
H. Singh
S. Setlur
V. Govindaraju
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of synthetic charts created for the Chart-Infographics ’19 challenge, used to enhance training data for chart data extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: Synthetic charts from the previous Chart-Infographics ’19 challenge
